ComicInfo.Summary: Witch Hunt Part 4: Sara has breakfast with Jake at a diner and things get chilly when Patrick stops by. Sara visits Father Fiorentino who tells her he has lost his faith and attacks her with soul sucking demons. Jake gets in the way and is cut down. Sara uses the Witchblade to decimate the demons and grill Dominic about what is going on. He reveals that a secret cabal of Catholic priests are on the verge of summoning a living god from an alternate dimension to take over the world.
